alert.note: Alert for White Mountains and High Terrain South of the Yukon River (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 04 at 2:36PM AKST until January 05 at 6:00AM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM AKST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Blowing snow with low visibility expected. Winds gusting to 40 mph. Wind chills to -50 are also possible. * WHERE...White Mountains and High Terrain South of the Yukon River. * WHEN...Until 6 AM AKST Friday. * IMPACTS...Travel will be difficult. Blowing snow will cause low visibility over elevated terrain. Large snow drifts will form. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The strongest winds will occur over elevated terrain. The strongest winds are expected to continue through Thursday morning. Valley locations will see winds up to 30 mph and blowing snow.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: White Mountains and High Terrain South of the Yukon River
